text: Ronald Holgate (born May 26, 1937) is an American actor and opera singer. He won the Tony Award for Best Supporting Actor as Richard Henry Lee in the original Broadway production of 1776."Tony Awards, 1969" broadwayworld.com, accessed June 26, 2011. He would re-play the role in 1972 for the movie 1776. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:People from Aberdeen, South Dakota Category:Actors from South Dakota Category:Singers from South Dakota
title: Ron Holgate
